Serialized Form

  • Package hangmanui

    • Class hangmanui.HangmanUI

      class HangmanUI extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttons
          JButton[] buttons
          Buttons for the letters of the alphabet.
        • drawHat
          boolean drawHat
          State variable indicating whether the figure should be drawn with a bow or a hat.
        • drawSkirt
          boolean drawSkirt
          State variable indicating whether the figure should be drawn wearing a skirt.
        • game
          Game game
          Current instance of the game.
        • gameCanvas
          hangmanui.HangmanUI.GameCanvas gameCanvas
          Custom panel for drawing the stick figure.
        • internalRand
          Random internalRand
          Random number generator for deciding how to draw the stick figure.
        • letters
          JPanel letters
          Panel for the letter buttons.
        • playAgainButton
          JButton playAgainButton
          Button for starting another round.
        • rand
          Random rand
          Random number generator for selecting words or phrases from file.
        • selector
          PhraseSelector selector
          The phrase selector.
        • wordCanvas
          hangmanui.HangmanUI.WordCanvas wordCanvas
          Custom panel for drawing the displayed word.
